name: com.unity.xr.googlevr.android
description:
*** IMPORTANT : READ ME ***

This package is deprecated and will be removed in Unity 2020.1.

More information with the latest recommendation can be found here <https://developers.google.com/vr/develop/unity/get-started-android>

This package contains the necessary components required to use the Google VR Virtual Reality SDK on Android. By using this package, you will be able to deploy and run your applications on Daydream/Cardboard supported devices.
